Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.personalBoard.resourceManager

Class Depot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.personalBoard.resourceManager.Depot
public class Depot
extends java.lang.Object
Depot is the class where we store the data and manage the resource of a single depot

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Depot​(int maxStorable)
    Constructor of Depot with only lockDepot and maxStorable, used for normal depots
    Depot​(Resource resource, int maxStorable)
    Main constructor of Depot with all the attributes, used for leader's depot

    • Depot

      public Depot​(Resource resource, int maxStorable)
      Main constructor of Depot with all the attributes, used for leader's depot
      Parameters:
      maxStorable - integer representing the max value of local resource
      resource - to initialize at

    • getResource

    • setResource

      public void setResource​(Resource resource) throws TooMuchResourceDepotException, InvalidOrganizationWarehouseException
      Set resource of curr Depot
      Parameters:
      resource - to set the curr depot at
      Throws:
      TooMuchResourceDepotException - if You tried to put more resources than possible
      InvalidOrganizationWarehouseException - if You can't insert a RESOURCETYPE_A in a leader depot of RESOURCETYPE_B

    • setEmptyResource

      public void setEmptyResource()
      Set the curr resource at value 0 and reset the type if is not a lockDepot

    • getResourceValue

      public int getResourceValue()
      Return the value of resource in depot
      Returns:
      the value of resource in depot

    • howMuchResCanIStillStoreIn

      public int howMuchResCanIStillStoreIn()
      Return how many free spaces available in curr depot
      Returns:
      how many free spaces available in curr depot

    • addResource

      public void addResource​(Resource newRes) throws TooMuchResourceDepotException
      Add a resource to the curr depot, adding the value if possible
      Parameters:
      newRes - to add to curr depot
      Throws:
      TooMuchResourceDepotException - if adding too much res in this depot

    • subResource

      public void subResource​(Resource newRes) throws NegativeResourceException, InvalidOrganizationWarehouseException
      Sub a resource to the curr depot, subtracting the value if possible
      Parameters:
      newRes - to sub to curr depot
      Throws:
      NegativeResourceException - if there are no resources here or if you can't sub more resources than are present
      InvalidOrganizationWarehouseException - if you try to sub a resource type different from his own
